WorkItem.Description:
My Character is a level 80 Ret Pally
 
1. File --> Load From Armory
2. Tried with and without force refresh but results are the same
3. Download character data seems to complete
4. Error occurs when parsing
 
This error only started occurring in the last two versions.
 
Error message below -
 
[Arg_KeyNotFound]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.50524.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_KeyNotFound
 
at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowKeyNotFoundException()
at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)
at Rawr.UI.BossPicker.character_ClassChanged(Object sender, EventArgs e)
at Rawr.UI.BossPicker.set_Character(Character value)
at Rawr.UI.MainPage.set_Character(Character value)
at Rawr.UI.MainPage.armoryLoad_Closed(Object sender, EventArgs e)
at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.OnClosed(EventArgs e)
at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.Close()
at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.set_DialogResult(Nullable`1 value)
at Rawr.UI.ArmoryLoadDialog._armoryService_GetCharacterCompleted(Object sender, EventArgs`1 e)
at Rawr.ElitistArmoryService.bwParseCharacter_RunWorkerCompleted(Object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.OnRunWorkerCompleted(RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.<OnRun>b__1(Object state)
 
Silverlight lookups fail after this error occurs.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Crash on refreshing character profile from armory

Comments.Message:
I also get this error, I'm afraid I don't understand if the closure message means I should not be getting it?

[Arg_KeyNotFound]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.50524.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_KeyNotFound

   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowKeyNotFoundException()
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)
   at Rawr.UI.BossPicker.character_ClassChanged(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at Rawr.UI.BossPicker.set_Character(Character value)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.set_Character(Character value)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.armoryLoad_Closed(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.OnClosed(EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.Close()
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.set_DialogResult(Nullable`1 value)
   at Rawr.UI.ArmoryLoadDialog._armoryService_GetCharacterCompleted(Object sender, EventArgs`1 e)
   at Rawr.ElitistArmoryService.bwParseCharacter_RunWorkerCompleted(Object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.OnRunWorkerCompleted(RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.<OnRun>b__1(Object state)
It means the next release will no longer have this problem

No, the closure message means you will continue getting the error till the next release/update but should not get error after that. Since the last release was earlier this week, the next could be two to three weeks from now. If at all possible, please use the Rawr2 version downloadable from "Downloads" tab.
